hill_station_tours.title: Hill Station Weekend Escapes
hill_station_tours.subtitle: Discover India's most enchanting mountain retreats
hill_station_tours.description: Escape the heat and hustle of city life with our curated hill station weekend getaways. Experience cool weather, stunning mountain views, and rejuvenating experiences in India's most beautiful highland destinations.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Local Exploration
itinerary.description: Arrive at your chosen hill station, check into your hotel, and spend the afternoon exploring nearby viewpoints and attractions. Enjoy a welcome dinner featuring local mountain cuisine.

itinerary.title: Full Day Excursion
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day tour of major attractions including viewpoints, lakes, waterfalls, and local markets. Experience the natural beauty and cultural charm of the destination.

itinerary.title: Nature Walk & Departure
itinerary.description: Begin your day with an optional early morning nature walk. After breakfast, enjoy some free time before checking out and departing with wonderful memories.

highlights: Cool mountain climate perfect for summer escapes
Breathtaking views of valleys and mountain ranges
Adventure activities like trekking and boating

accommodations.name: Shimla Heritage Resort
accommodations.description: Colonial-style property offering panoramic Himalayan views, vintage decor, fireplaces, and garden dining experiences.

accommodations.name: Ooty Plantation Retreat
accommodations.description: Charming cottages surrounded by tea and spice plantations, featuring rustic decor, organic dining, and nature trails.

accommodations.name: Darjeeling Mountain Lodge
accommodations.description: Cozy property with spectacular Kanchenjunga views, traditional Himalayan architecture, and tea garden surroundings.

accommodations.name: Kodaikanal Lakeside Hotel
accommodations.description: Serene accommodation near the star-shaped lake with misty mountain views, bonfire facilities, and boating access.

destinations.name: Shimla
destinations.description: The former summer capital of British India, Shimla offers colonial charm, Mall Road shopping, and stunning Himalayan panoramas. Perfect for heritage walks and mountain adventures.

activities: Arrival and check-in at heritage resort
Evening stroll on historic Mall Road
Visit to Viceregal Lodge and gardens
Explore Jakhu Temple and meet the monkeys
Shopping for woolen items and handicrafts
Morning excursion to Kufri for snow views

destinations.name: Darjeeling
destinations.description: Famous for its tea plantations and views of Mt. Kanchenjunga, Darjeeling offers toy train rides, Buddhist monasteries, and colonial charm in an Eastern Himalayan setting.

activities: Arrival and check-in at tea estate property
Visit to Happy Valley Tea Estate
Early morning visit to Tiger Hill for sunrise
Shopping for Darjeeling tea and handicrafts

destinations.name: Ooty
destinations.description: The 'Queen of Hill Stations' in the Nilgiri Mountains offers colonial bungalows, botanical gardens, and a pleasant year-round climate. Famous for its toy train and chocolate.

activities: Arrival and check-in at plantation retreat
Morning Nilgiri Mountain Railway toy train ride

destinations.name: Kodaikanal
destinations.description: Known as the 'Princess of Hill Stations', Kodaikanal features a star-shaped lake, misty waterfalls, and verdant forests in the Western Ghats. Perfect for quiet getaways.

activities: Arrival and check-in at lakeside property
Visit to Coaker's Walk for valley views
